about.text_1: With a passion for crafting digital experiences, I've immersed myself in the realm of front-end development in 2019. Specializing in React.js, I am turning designs into dynamic, user-friendly interfaces.
about.text_2: As a team player, I thrive in dynamic environments where collective ideas transform into remarkable products. My journey as a front-end developer has fortified my problem-solving skills, allowing me to navigate complex challenges and deliver elegant solutions.
about.text_3: Join me on this coding adventure as I continue to evolve, innovate, and contribute to the ever-changing world of front-end development!

mavik.title: Mavik-Pro landing page
mavik.text_1: What tools were used: HTML, CSS/SASS, JavaScript, Slick-slider, GreenSock (GSAP) for animation, PHPMailer.
mavik.text_2: This is a landing page which were designed myself with a light animation utilized the GSAP (GreenSock) library.

ca.title: ChipAssist marketplace
ca.text_1: What tools were used: TypeScript, React.js, Redux, React-router-dom, Material ui, Styled-components, I18n, React hook form, Axios, Stripe
ca.text_2: Marketplace of electronic components that includes catalog and cart. Our users may request existing products or download a CVS/XML file (BOM) and we'll try to find the best proposals.

requests.title: ChipAssist stock exchange
requests.text_1: What tools were used: TypeScript, React.js, Redux, React-router-dom, Material ui, Styled-components, I18n, Axios
requests.text_2: This is a stock exchange for our sellers where they may provide the best prices for user's requests.

dashboard.title: Management dashboard
dashboard.text_1: What tools were used: TypeScript, React.js, React-router-dom, Material ui, DevExtreme, Vite, AWS
dashboard.text_2: This is frontend part of dashboard to manage any data.

pcb_calc.title: PCB calculator
pcb_calc.text_1: What tools were used: TypeScript, React.js, Material ui, I18n
pcb_calc.text_2: This is a calculator for PCB panels (electronic boards) where user may select different type, size, materials and etc.

contacts.name: Full name
contacts.alert: Thank you, I will answer you as soon as possible!
